Parameter.Name: EnableLanguageMicrosoftFormat
Parameter.Description: Determines whether the language is in Microsoft Locale format instead of ISO format.

Parameter.Name: TuiPasswordMinLength
Parameter.Description: Determines the min length of the TuiPassword

Parameter.Name: TuiPasswordMaxLength
Parameter.Description: Determines the max length of the TuiPassword

Parameter.Name: TuiPasswordNumOfNearbyIdenticalChars
Parameter.Description: The maximum number of adjacent and identical characters that can be set in the TuiPassword

Parameter.Name: TuiPasswordValidateNotAllCharsIdentical
Parameter.Description: Determines whether to validate and fail cases in which all charachters in the password are identical

Parameter.Name: TuiPasswordNumOfNearbyConsecutiveChars
Parameter.Description: The maximum number of adjacent and consecutive characters that can be set in the TuiPassword

Parameter.Name: TuiPasswordValidateNotAllCharsConsecutive
Parameter.Description: Determines whether to validate and fail cases in which all charachters in the password are identical

Parameter.Name: EnableTuiPasswordSubsetOfTelephone
Parameter.Description: Determines whether to check if TuiPassword is subset of TelephoneNumber

Parameter.Name: InternetPasswordMinLength
Parameter.Description: Determines the min length of the Internet password

Parameter.Name: InternetPasswordMaxLength
Parameter.Description: Determines the max length of the Internet password

Parameter.Name: InternetPasswordMinNumOfDigits
Parameter.Description: Determines the minimum number of digits that are allowed in the password

Parameter.Name: InternetPasswordMinNumOfLetters
Parameter.Description: Determines the minimum number of letter characters that are allowed in the password

Parameter.Name: TuiPasswordDefault
Parameter.Description: Determines the default TuiPassword

Parameter.Name: ActivityStatusDefault
Parameter.Description: Determines the default ActivityStatus

Parameter.Name: AddDomainSuffixToDefaultInternetUsername
Parameter.Description: Determines whether the default InternetUsername value should be created with or without domain suffix

Parameter.Name: TuiPasswordDefaultSource
Parameter.Description: Determines the default TuiPassword value source.

Parameter.Name: InternetUserNameFormat
Parameter.Description: Determines whether the provisioning key supplied is an International or a National number.

Parameter.Name: TransactionCleanupInterval
Parameter.Description: The time interval (in seconds) between each transaction cleanup procedure to be run on the transactions container.

Parameter.Name: XDSVRequestTimeout
Parameter.Description: Defines the XDSV request timeout (in milliseconds). Used by transaction object.

Parameter.Name: MAMessageTypesEnableFlagsOrder
Parameter.Description: Determines the bit order (top to bottom) of the MailAccountMessageType field created in any MailAccount entry.

Parameter.Name: ErrorDescriptionMappingFile
Parameter.Description: File that holds the PA Error Description Mappings. Used by ErrorDescSingleton.

Parameter.Name: PaInitObject
Parameter.Description: Defines the class name which performs the initialization of the PA.

Parameter.Name: PaInvokeObject
Parameter.Description: Defines the class name which performs the request invocation of the PA.

Parameter.Name: PaPluginsList
Parameter.Description: Indicates which plugins the PA will activate

Parameter.Name: MailAccountUserNameFormat
Parameter.Description: Determines whether the provisioning key supplied is an International or a National number.

Parameter.Name: SupportedCommands
Parameter.Description: List of supported commands.

Parameter.Name: SupportedEntity
Parameter.Description: Defines the supported entity.

Parameter.Name: UniqueDbConstraint
Parameter.Description: Defines the DB constraint name and its matching ComPAS field name it represents.

Parameter.Name: RequestPasswordIvParameter
Parameter.Description: The IV Parameter that is used to decrypt the password fields received in the request. For 3DES it must be 8 characters long. For AES it must be 16 characters long.

Parameter.Name: RequestPasswordMode
Parameter.Description: The cryptography mode used to decrypt the password fields received in the request.

Parameter.Name: RequestPasswordPadding
Parameter.Description: The cryptography padding used to decrypt the password fields received in the request.

Parameter.Name: RequestPasswordSecretKey
Parameter.Description: The secret key used to decrypt the password fields received in the request. For 3DES it must be 24 characters long. For AES it must be 16 characters long.

Parameter.Name: MAEmailOnlyEMSProvisioning
Parameter.Description: Determines whether the external email server is provisioned.

Parameter.Name: SupportMaPasswordInLdapSchema
Parameter.Description: Indicates whether the LDAP schema support the MailAccount/Password field

Parameter.Name: MaPasswordEncryptOnSrl
Parameter.Description: Indicates whether the MailAccountPassword should be sent in SrlCreate encrypted or not

Parameter.Name: MAAdditionalAddressUserSource
Parameter.Description: Determines the user value (email prefix) source for the additional operator VM MAs address.

Parameter.Name: MAPasswordEncyptionFormat
Parameter.Description: Determines the way that the MA password will be kept in the data store.

Parameter.Name: MAPasswordIvParameter
Parameter.Description: The IV Parameter that is used to encrypt and decrypt the password fields. For 3DES it must be 8 characters long. For AES it must be 16 characters long.

Parameter.Name: MAPasswordMode
Parameter.Description: The cryptography mode used to encrypt and decrypt the password fields.

Parameter.Name: MAPasswordPadding
Parameter.Description: The cryptography padding used to encrypt and decrypt the password fields.

Parameter.Name: MAPasswordSecretKey
Parameter.Description: The secret key used to encrypt and decrypt the password fields. For 3DES it must be 24 characters long. For AES it must be 16 characters long.

Parameter.Name: MAAdditionalAddressDomain
Parameter.Description: Determines an additional voicemail operator mail account domain (address suffix) which is added as an additional alias.

Parameter.Name: MADefaultAddressDomain
Parameter.Description: Determines the email operator mail account domain (address suffix).

Parameter.Name: MADefaultPassword
Parameter.Description: Determines the default value of the MailAccountPassword field.

Parameter.Name: MAPasswordDefaultSource
Parameter.Description: Determines the default MAPassword value source.

Parameter.Name: MlFilePrefixName
Parameter.Description: Defines mailing list file prefix name

Parameter.Name: CliFilePrefixName
Parameter.Description: Defines CLI greeting list file prefix name

Parameter.Name: BulletFilePrefixName
Parameter.Description: Defines bulletin file prefix name

Parameter.Name: AccessedPhoneFilePrefixName
Parameter.Description: Defines accessed phone greeting file prefix name

Parameter.Name: CustomFilePrefixName
Parameter.Description: Defines custom greeting file prefix name

Parameter.Name: PaPluginObject
Parameter.Description: Defines the class name which represents the plugin

Parameter.Name: PaPluginObject
Parameter.Description: Defines the class name which represents the plugin

Parameter.Name: FileSystemStructureFile
Parameter.Description: Determines the name of the file that describe the directory structure of the file system on the NFS server.

Parameter.Name: FileSystemRootDir
Parameter.Description: Determines the full path to the NFS root directory.

Parameter.Name: SkipTuiPasswordOnDefault
Parameter.Description: The default value while creating a new additional ID entry

Parameter.Name: PaPluginObject
Parameter.Description: Defines the class name which represents the plugin

Parameter.Name: PaPluginObject
Parameter.Description: Defines the class name which represents the plugin

Parameter.Name: BulletinAdminMappedFields
Parameter.Description: Defines the fields that will be mapped to the BulletinAdminTelephoneNumber. For example: GlobalLanguageId and VxVCustom6.

Parameter.Name: BulletinAdminFieldsValuesMapping
Parameter.Description: Defines the value mappings between one or more fields and BulletinAdminTelephoneNumber. For example: GlobalLanguageId and VxVCustom6.

Parameter.Name: PaPluginObject
Parameter.Description: Defines the class name which represents the plugin

Parameter.Name: EnablePreExecutionLogics
Parameter.Description: Determines whether the NotificationRules PreExecution method will be invoked.

Parameter.Name: PaPluginObject
Parameter.Description: Defines the class name which represents the plugin

Parameter.Name: TuiPasswordEncryptionMethod
Parameter.Description: Determines the mechanism to be used in order to encrypt the TuiPassword field before storing it in the data store.

Parameter.Name: TuiPasswordIvParameter
Parameter.Description: The IV Parameter that is used to encrypt and decrypt the password fields. For 3DES it must be 8 characters long. For AES it must be 16 characters long.

Parameter.Name: TuiPasswordMode
Parameter.Description: The cryptography mode used to encrypt and decrypt the password fields.

Parameter.Name: TuiPasswordPadding
Parameter.Description: The cryptography padding used to encrypt and decrypt the password fields.

Parameter.Name: TuiPasswordSecretKey
Parameter.Description: The secret key used to encrypt and decrypt the password fields. For 3DES it must be 24 characters long. For AES it must be 16 characters long.

Parameter.Name: InternetPasswordEncryptionMethod
Parameter.Description: Determines the mechanism to be used in order to encrypt the InternetPassword field before storing it in the data store.

Parameter.Name: InternetPasswordIvParameter
Parameter.Description: The IV Parameter that is used to encrypt and decrypt the password fields. For 3DES it must be 8 characters long. For AES it must be 16 characters long.

Parameter.Name: InternetPasswordMode
Parameter.Description: The cryptography mode used to encrypt and decrypt the password fields.

Parameter.Name: InternetPasswordPadding
Parameter.Description: The cryptography padding used to encrypt and decrypt the password fields.

Parameter.Name: InternetPasswordSecretKey
Parameter.Description: The secret key used to encrypt and decrypt the password fields. For 3DES it must be 24 characters long. For AES it must be 16 characters long.

Parameter.Description: Defines the class name which represents the plugin

Parameter.Description: Determines the min length of the NabHandsetPassword

Parameter.Name: NabHandsetPasswordMaxLength
Parameter.Description: Determines the max length of the NabHandsetPassword

Parameter.Name: NabHandsetPasswordMinNumOfDigits
Parameter.Description: Determines the minimum number of digits that are allowed in the password

Parameter.Name: NabHandsetPasswordMinNumOfLetters
Parameter.Description: Determines the minimum number of letter characters that are allowed in the password

Parameter.Name: NabHandsetPasswordEncryptionMethod
Parameter.Description: Determines the mechanism to be used in order to encrypt the NabHandsetPassword field before storing it in the data store.

Parameter.Name: NabHandsetPasswordIvParameter
Parameter.Description: The IV Parameter that is used to encrypt and decrypt the password fields. For 3DES it must be 8 characters long. For AES it must be 16 characters long.

Parameter.Name: NabHandsetPasswordMode
Parameter.Description: The cryptography mode used to encrypt and decrypt the password fields.

Parameter.Name: NabHandsetPasswordPadding
Parameter.Description: The cryptography padding used to encrypt and decrypt the password fields.

Parameter.Name: NabHandsetPasswordSecretKey
Parameter.Description: The secret key used to encrypt and decrypt the password fields. For 3DES it must be 24 characters long. For AES it must be 16 characters long.

Parameter.Name: CustomizationMappingFilesPath
Parameter.Description: Defines the path of the CustomizationMapping.xml files that allows during request to customize fields and values. If parameter is empty no manipulation will be done.

Parameter.Description: Defines command types in which the customization logic will be skipped.
